stuff_msgithub_c:
i own the domain microsoftgithub.com, and use it to rickroll people.
to use this, grab any github/github gist url and replace 'github.com' with 'microsoftgithub.com'.

{val}k rickrolls so far >:)
stuff_nint_c:
same as above, but for any nintendo.com page.
you know the drill, just replace 'nintendo.com' with 'nintendo.uk.net'.
